verse:
अणोरणीयान् महतो महीयानात्मा गुहायां निहितोऽस्य जन्तोः।
तमक्रतुः पश्यति वीतशोको धातुः प्रसादान्महिमानमीशम्‌॥

terms.गुहायां: In the cave of the heart,
terms.प्रसादान् महिमानम्: By the grace of the Lord,

meaning: Meaning:Smaller than the smallest and greater than the greatest, the Self resides in the cave of every living being's heart. The one who controls everything perceives this Self. By the grace of the Lord, the perfect one, he is free from grief and beholds the greatness of the Supreme Controller.
